channel.title: Client ( Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading ErazedPKz )
channel.description:
Hello well i'm currently trying to run my friends client but i keep getting this error:
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/mw2jur.png[/img]
I've updated to the latest JDK, & updated my Java yet it's still doing it.. is it a problem with the client its self & how can i fix it or is it a problem with me running it & how can i fix that..
This problem needs to be dealt with ASAP if you manage to help me i'll be willing to make a donation.
